remarks: Define set of all projective subspaces.  Based on definition of subspace in [Holland95] p. 212.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2011.)
statement:
df-psubsp $p |- PSubSp = ( k e. _V |-> { s | ( s C_ ( Atoms ` k ) /\ A. p e. s A. q e. s A. r e. ( Atoms ` k ) ( r ( le ` k ) ( p ( join ` k ) q ) -> r e. s ) ) } ) $.
$d k p q r s $.
